## QueryTable class

Datasource based on a query using OpenRestDB

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class QueryTable extends SQLSource implements DataSource 
```
**Extends:** SQLSource

**Implements:** [DataSource](./forms42core.datasource.md)
